A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought it was a fantastic movie. I loved the diversity\, the strong female characters\, and the overall message of the movie. We tend to put our heroes on a pedestal and they can never live up to the image we created in our minds. I loved that Luke Skywalker was fallible. I loved the message of hope and that the fight will always continue in the future generations. The resistance will never die. As long as there is darkness there will always be those fighting for the light.
